entry.title: Russia's Shelling of Ukrainian Nuclear Power Plant Sparks Alarm
entry.content: Russian shelling in southern Ukraine caused a fire at Europe’s largest nuclear power plant before Russian troops moved into the facility, highlighting the increasingly indiscriminate nature of Moscow’s war while raising fears that it could lead to a global environmental disaster.

entry.title: Venezuela Pushes for Lift in U.S. Sanctions So Oil Can Flow
entry.content: The regime is encouraging debtholders to pressure the Biden administration, which is wary of fast-rising oil prices caused by the war in Ukraine.
